routes.login.form.fields.password.requir: You haven't entered your password. Please provide it to continue.

components.forms.email.label: Email
components.forms.email.description: This address is not transferred to third parties.
components.forms.email.required: You haven't entered the email address. Please provide it to continue.
components.forms.email.invalid: The email address you entered isn't in the correct format. Please enter a valid one (e.g. name@example.com).
components.forms.email.registered: This email address is already registered. Please try a different one.
components.forms.email.unregistered: This email address isn't registered yet. Please enter an existing one.
components.forms.otp.heading: Verification
components.forms.otp.sent: We've sent a message with 6-digit verification code to your inbox:
components.forms.otp.sending: We're sending a message with 6-digit verification code to your inbox:
components.forms.password.newPassword1.d: Regularly update your passwords for added security.
components.forms.password.newPassword1.m: Your new password must be at least {{ length }} characters long.
components.forms.password.newPassword2.d: Make sure both entered passwords match.
components.forms.password.newPassword2.m: The confirmation password must be at least {{ length }} characters long.
components.registration.steps.email.head: Registration
components.registration.steps.email.desc: Enter your email to create an account. A one-time password (OTP) will be sent to this address for verification.
components.registration.steps.password.d: Enter a password for your new account. You can always change it later.
components.resetPassword.steps.email.des: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a message with further instructions.
Enter a new password for your account. You can always change it later.
components.changePassword.steps.descript: You can change your password, which will be requested when you log into your account.
This action will not affect your sessions on other devices.
components.changePassword.steps.password: Enter password for your account which will be used to log in.
components.changePassword.steps.done.des: You have successfully changed permanent password for your current account.
components.changePassword.steps.done.pur: Now it will be used to log into your account and verify your identity.
components.changePassword.steps.done.edi: You can always change it again later.
components.changeEmail.steps.description: You have the option to change your email address, which will be used for logging in and recovering access to your account.
This action will not affect your sessions on other devices.
components.changeEmail.steps.email.descr: The address that can be used to log in and recover account access.
components.changeEmail.steps.done.descri: You have successfully changed and verified the email address for your current account.
components.changeEmail.steps.done.purpos: Now it will receive security notifications and can be used to log in and recover account access.
components.changeEmail.steps.done.editab: You can always change it again later.
components.avatarEdit.confirm.title: Remove avatar
components.avatarEdit.confirm.descriptio: Do you really want to remove this avatar? This action cannot be undone.
